root.name: Darkmere: The Nightmare's Begun
root.description: The land ridden with problems, all caused by the infernal darkness "Darkmere", which has fallen on the land the land. The land is barren and fruitless, the streets overrun by havock-rising Orcs. As Ebryn, the hero, you fight your way through the dark alleys with your Magic Blade, complete quests and level up.

similar_games.game: Valhalla and the Lord of Infinity
